title: Waterford 2011 Silver Partridge Ornament, 1st Edition 12 Days of Christmas
description: In keeping with tradition, Waterford premiers the First Edition of Waterford Silver Christmas, an inspiring collection of beautiful silver ornaments. The iconic holiday designs and milestone commemoratives will add shimmering sparkle to any well trimmed tree. This Partridge Ornament is plated in fine silver, finished with a tarnish resistant protective lacquer, and bejeweled with colorful crystal gems. It is beautifully presented with a red ribbon hanger in an elegant gift box. To give or receive, this Partridge Ornament is the perfect collectible for transforming holiday moments into cherished memories.
